title: 4 Simple Steps to Permanently Delete Your Hulu Account

steps.title: Cancel
steps.content: Cancel your subscription. Before you delete your account, make sure to end any active subscription you have with Hulu. [1] X Research source If you subscribed through Hulu directly, you can cancel on their website. Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account and select Cancel next to Cancel Your Subscription . If you subscribed through a third-party, you'll need to cancel through their website.

steps.title: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account/delete in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account/delete in a web browser. You can use a mobile or desktop browser. Currently, there's no way to delete your Hulu account from the mobile app.

steps.title: Log into your account.
steps.content: Log into your account. If you're already logged in, you'll be asked to provide your password again.

steps.title: Select Start Deletion.
steps.content: Select Start Deletion . This is the red button. Your account will be deleted, and you'll be signed out . If needed, you can contact Hulu support .
